comment.body: I will try to translat this article into chinese.However,most tof the chinese are using windows operation system,it will be great if you worte a ss tutorial on windows op system.

> [grimsdottir](#comment_3_1Q3DcejYbdNFDSDdjpznMmgg1ZCzn1SUsn): Yes, I can do that, I'll take me a bit of time but otherwise no problem.
> However, Linux is much more trustworthy than Windows for many reasons so switching to it if you are privacy conscious is a good move :)

Yes.Indeed linux is much better.That is why I have two laptop one is linux and the other is windows :D.But you know,most of the games are running on windows,and most of the people are using office :(.
